svg.content: <mxfile><diagram id="attendance_system_architecture" name="勤怠管理システム アーキテクチャ"></diagram></mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 26px; margin-left: 77px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #2D7600;

display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#2D7600, #73b14c); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
